00371 /* Fixed-point math settings  */
00372 
00373 #define XY_FIXED_SHIFT 16 
00374 #define XY_FIXED_SHIFT_HALF 8 
00375 #define XY_FIXED_ONE (1 << XY_FIXED_SHIFT) 
00376 #define XY_FIXED_HALF (1 << (XY_FIXED_SHIFT - 1)) 
00378 /* Limits for fixed-point values (for signed 32-bit ints) */
00379 
00380 #define XY_FIXED_MAX 0x7FFFFFFF 
00381 #define XY_FIXED_MIN -(0x80000000) 
00382 #define XY_FIXED_NAN XY_FIXED_MAX

00958 #define XY_mult(a,b) (((a) >> XY_FIXED_SHIFT_HALF) * \
00959                       ((b) >> XY_FIXED_SHIFT_HALF))
00960 
00968 #define XY_qdiv(a,b) (((a) / \
00969                        ((b) >> XY_FIXED_SHIFT_HALF)) \
00970                       << XY_FIXED_SHIFT_HALF)
00971 
00981 #define XY_div(a,b) (((b) >> XY_FIXED_SHIFT_HALF) == 0 ? \
00982                      XY_FIXED_NAN : XY_qdiv((a),(b)))
00983 
00989 #define XY_FIXED_DIV_ZERO ((1 << XY_FIXED_SHIFT_HALF) - 1)
00990 
00994 #define XY_fpart(a) ((a) & (XY_FIXED_ONE - 1))
00995 
00999 #define XY_rfpart(a) (XY_FIXED_ONE - XY_fpart(a))
01000 
01004 #define XY_ipart(a) ((a) - XY_fpart(a))
01005 
01009 #define XY_round(a) (XY_ipart((a) + (1 << (XY_FIXED_SHIFT - 1))))
